textBeforeTable: Recent topics in "Backyard Garden Survivalists" join to post we were taught this method when we moved here and had to clear 5 acres of land , We still do every two times a year but also when the goat hut needs to be cleaned out, then the hedges are cut down and added. We normally tie cut small branches and bark into small bundles with the old used string for the hay, when it's dried it makes great fire starter for our wood burning stoves in the winter.
